name: Aries
description: The ram. It has the qualities of impulsivity and leadership. Entrepreneurial. They want to do, to initiate.

name: Taurus
description: The bull. It has the qualities of patience, groundedness and stubbornness. Seeks comfort and aesthetical pleasure.

name: Gemini
description: The twins. Sign of duality. Social, curious, friendly and intellectual. Seeks a lot of stimulation.

name: Cancer
description: The crab. Sensitive with a protective shell. Nurturing and resourceful in all matters. Takes a measured, indirect path.

name: Leo
description: The lion. Loyalty important. Gregarious person. Need or impulse for the spotlight and often attractive in it.

name: Virgo
description: The virgin. Concerned with health and nutrition. Impulsive: very neat or very sloppy in any given area. Love to serve other people.

name: Libra
description: The scales of justice and economy alike. Affinity with the arts and music. Seeks balance, rightness, justice. Socially-oriented.

name: Scorpio
description: The scorpion. Very high or very low moral standing. Intense, driven. Doesn't take anything lighthearted. Will merge or push.

name: Sagittarius
description: The archer. Happy-go-lucky. Aims for goals and ideals, often for and in faraway places; opposing and varied experiences.

name: Capricorn
description: The mountain goat. Highly ambitious to climb to the top. A builder of structured environments. Does well in business.

name: Aquarius
description: The water-bearer. Sign of friendships. They are humnitarians and are primarily attuned to others on that scale of basis.

name: Pisces
description: The fish. The sensitive dreamer. Emphasis on some or all of the senses. Affinity with media of all forms; information throughput.
